string.name: camera_permission_reason
string.value: 需要相机权限进行照片上传

string.value: 需要访问相册进行图片上传

string.name: write_media_permission_reason
string.value: 需要拍照进行照片上传

string.name: notification_permission_reason
string.value: 用于发送健康数据异常通知

string.name: bundle_info_reason
string.value: 用于获取应用包信息以发送通知

string.name: vibrate_permission_reason
string.value: 用于在健康数据异常时提醒用户

string.name: call_permission_reason
string.value: 用于紧急情况下快速拨打急救电话
